entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023
